description: Introducing the all new Vidal Sassoon pro 1875 watt touch control hair dryer. Touch slider controls allow you to adjust the temperature setting to your exact styling preference with a touch of a finger. The temperature lock feature prevents accidental setting changes and memorizes previous setting. Hair dryer comes with a tourmaline and ceramic, cold shot button and concentrator attachment.
title: Vidal Sassoon Pro Series Touch Control Digital Hair Dryer, 1875 Watt
